p:
Fastq data files were trimmed using Trim Galore (version 0.5.0)
19 . The trimmed sequences were aligned against the human genome (GRCH38) using HISAT2 before sorting reads using samtools
20, 21 . Finally, reads were quantified using featureCounts (version 1.6.4) against the GENCODE gene reference
22, 23 .
